column5: Just wondering if anyone knows of some spots on Sharon creek resovoir.
Hello and welcome to the board.  Where abouts is Sharon Creek reservoir?

That would be 'reservoir'.  Welcome to pikeman 34 and a half.  Good luck with your info request.  As a rule, we like to get to know someone before we share our experiences and hot spots.  Would you be any different?  'Hey Bro', do any of these babes like to go out?'

Welcome aboard Pikeman !!! I know Sharon Creek reservoir. That would be the reservoir in Delaware .My dad used to take me fishin there when I was a kid....Nice spot but I havent been for many years....  Cheers !!
